title: Communications Esencia (U.S. Fish And Wildlife Service, Region 4)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Reports show that US Fish and Wildlife is concerned about a development in Cabo Rojo called Proyecto Esencia because of possible impacts to the natural environment and wildlife in the area. The memo cited in the report CC's the PRPB, EPA, and DNER: https://mareaecologista.com/2024/10/funcionario-donante-del-pnp-y-junta-de-planificacion-certifican-esencia-como-proyecto-estrategico-aunque-us-fish-and-wildlife-expreso-preocupacion-por-impacto-adverso-que-provoc/

Therefore, I request the following records:

1) Any communications, emails, memos, text messages, and attachments exchanged between your department and the pertinent Puerto Rican agencies in charge of developments in protected terrain. (These include the Puerto Rico Department of Natural and Environmental Resources (DNER), the Puerto Rico Planification Board (PRPB), the Puerto Rico Permits Management Office (OGPE, in Spanish), and the Department of Economic Development and Commerce (DDEC, in Spanish).

To aid in your search:
DNER email addresses end in @drna.pr.gov
PRPB email addresses end in @jp.pr.gov
OGPE email addresses end in @ogpe.pr.gov
DDEC email addresses end in @ddec.pr.gov

2) Any communications, emails, memos, text messages, and attachments exchanged between your department and the pertinent agencies in charge of environmental issues and construction on protected terrain. (These include: the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Region 2, US Fish and Wildlife (USFS) Region 4, and the US Army Corps of Engineers (USACE) Caribbean District, part of the South Atlantic Division)

To aid in your search:
EPA email addresses end in epa.gov
USFS email addresses end in fws.gov.
USACE email addresses end in @usace.army.mil

3) Any internal communications, emails, memos, text messages, and attachments exchanged between employees of your agency about the Esencia development in Cabo Rojo.

Keywords: "Esencia," "Cabo Rojo Land Acquisition LLC," and "Strategic Project"

This request is for all records produced between January 1, 2024 and the time this request is processed. In the event that records are produced, please send them to me on a rolling basis. 

The requested documents will be used in the course of reporting about environmental issues in Puerto Rico for the newsletter Heavy Weather. Documents retrieved from this request will be made available to the general public and the request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
